issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/133086#issue-1421641350 - It seems that it's caused by `Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List`.
As a temporary solution please try to add this rule:
```adblock
twitter.com,twitter3e4tixl4xyajtrzo62zg5vztmjuricljdp2c5kshju4avyoid.onion#@?#div[class^=css-] > div[tabindex="0"] + div[role=group]:-abp-has(> div[data-testid]):-abp-has(div[role=button]:first-of-type + div[role=button]:last-of-type):-abp-has(svg)
```
to user rules.
<hr>

@DandelionSprout Could you please take a look at the first issue? - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/133086#issue-1421641350
This:
>Any time I open the menu to add a GIF to a tweet or whenever I need to log in I can't do it with adguard enabled. The menu comes up and them instantly blips away into the void of nothing

It looks like that it's caused by this rule:
```adblock
twitter.com,twitter3e4tixl4xyajtrzo62zg5vztmjuricljdp2c5kshju4avyoid.onion#?#div[class^=css-] > div[tabindex="0"] + div[role=group]:has(> div[data-testid]):has(div[role=button]:first-of-type + div[role=button]:last-of-type):has(svg)
```
from `Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List`
https://github.com/DandelionSprout/adfilt/blob/cd008a26fed706d238d445e5babc63a7bc6487f5/uBO%20list%20extensions/BrowseWebsitesWithoutLoggingIn-uBOExtension.txt#L93
To reproduce it's necessary to click on a "Gif" button (after this refreshing website might be required).
<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/197698671-5b9871ea-f4bb-4119-9368-91ca3fbf30fd.png)

</details>

<hr>

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/133086#issuecomment-1289992785 - Please try to disable-enable content blockers, update filters and check again.

This issue has been escalated to [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra):
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/371

Please wait until it is solved there.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, you’re probably already using AdGuard Extra so you just need to wait until it is updated.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Если отключить AdGuard и нажать на кнопку «Отправить код», то затем при включении AdGuard, проблема не воспроизводится. Поэтому нужно либо каждый раз открывать в режиме Инкогнито, либо каждый раз чистить куки и кэш для `x5.ru` и `5ka.ru`. > > Проблема то ли в Stealth Mode (рефер и и юзер-агент), то ли в фильтрах с защитой от трекинга или защитой от трекинга в URL. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
@MajkiIT Mógłbyś proszę spojrzeć?
Ta reguła:
```adblock
ticketmaster.pl#?#div[class^="sc-"]:-abp-contains(Reklama)
```
z polskiej listy ukrywa całą zawartość strony.

issue.title: embed.kijk.nl
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock 1.44.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly, AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tvblik.nl/hart-van-nederland/23-oktober-2022

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Visiting sites that have embedded videos from https://embed.kijk.nl (Example: https://tvblik.nl/hart-van-nederland/23-oktober-2022 ) triggers an anti-adblock warning on/from embed.kijk.nl. This anti-adblock warning is not seen when viewing straight from kijk.nl

This is triggered by the rule 

`##.pub_300x250.pub_300x250m.pub_728x90.text-ad.textAd.text_ad.text_ads.text-ads.text-ad-links:style(display: block !important;)`

Creating an exception as 

`embed.kijk.nl#@#.pub_300x250.pub_300x250m.pub_728x90.text-ad.textAd.text_ad.text_ads.text-ads.text-ad-links:style(display: block !important;)`

Fixes the issue with no adds. 

3. Screenshots
<details>
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3149302/197776657-775da198-5115-40f9-ad2b-82c334615195.png)
</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard Browser Extension, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить для Chrome, Edge или других браузеров на базе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)

labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.37

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock 1.44.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly, AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tvblik.nl/hart-van-nederland/23-oktober-2022

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Visiting sites that have embedded videos from https://embed.kijk.nl (Example: https://tvblik.nl/hart-van-nederland/23-oktober-2022 ) triggers an anti-adblock warning on/from embed.kijk.nl. This anti-adblock warning is not seen when viewing straight from kijk.nl

This is triggered by the rule 

`##.pub_300x250.pub_300x250m.pub_728x90.text-ad.textAd.text_ad.text_ads.text-ads.text-ad-links:style(display: block !important;)`

Creating an exception as 

`embed.kijk.nl#@#.pub_300x250.pub_300x250m.pub_728x90.text-ad.textAd.text_ad.text_ads.text-ads.text-ad-links:style(display: block !important;)`

Fixes the issue with no adds. 

3. Screenshots
<details>
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3149302/197776657-775da198-5115-40f9-ad2b-82c334615195.png)
</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: embed.kijk.nl

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock 1.44.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly, AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tvblik.nl/hart-van-nederland/23-oktober-2022

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Visiting sites that have embedded videos from https://embed.kijk.nl (Example: https://tvblik.nl/hart-van-nederland/23-oktober-2022 ) triggers an anti-adblock warning on/from embed.kijk.nl. This anti-adblock warning is not seen when viewing straight from kijk.nl

This is triggered by the rule 

`##.pub_300x250.pub_300x250m.pub_728x90.text-ad.textAd.text_ad.text_ads.text-ads.text-ad-links:style(display: block !important;)`

Creating an exception as 

`embed.kijk.nl#@#.pub_300x250.pub_300x250m.pub_728x90.text-ad.textAd.text_ad.text_ads.text-ads.text-ad-links:style(display: block !important;)`

Fixes the issue with no adds. 

3. Screenshots
<details>
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3149302/197776657-775da198-5115-40f9-ad2b-82c334615195.png)
</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
